solution_line_template: Each of the long puzzles took {multiplier}*{warm_up_time}=<<{multiplier}*{warm_up_time}={long_puzzle_time}>>{long_puzzle_time} minutes to solve
So he spent {long_puzzle_time}*{num_long_puzzles}=<<{long_puzzle_time}*{num_long_puzzles}={total_long_puzzles_time}>>{total_long_puzzles_time} minutes solving them
That means he spent {total_long_puzzles_time}+{warm_up_time}=<<{total_long_puzzles_time}+{warm_up_time}={total_time_spent}>>{total_time_spent} minutes solving puzzles
